sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-title>{{ post.title.rendered }}</v-card-title>
    <v-card-text> {{ post.content.rendered }} </v-card-text>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-textarea v-model="content" filled v-show="editMode"></v-textarea>
    </v-card-text>
    <!--COMMENTS SECTION-->
    <v-row rows="6">
      <v-col cols="4" v-for="commentEl in comments" :key="commentEl.ids">
        <PostCard :post="commentEl" />
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
    <v-card-actions>
      <v-btn @click="showComment">Add Comment</v-btn
      ><v-btn :edit="editMode" v-show="editMode" @click="addComment"
        >Save Comment</v-btn
      >
    </v-card-actions>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    comment: Object,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      comments: [],
      editMode: false,
      content: this.content,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    showComment() {
      this.editMode = !this.editMode;
    },
    async addComment() {
      let res = await PostService.createComment({
        content: this.content,
      });
      console.log(res);
    },
  },
  created() {},
};
</script>
